item.description:
Hello Everyone,I trust you are having a healthy and eventful week and now looking foor some R and R this weekend!

We are starting our 3rd Weight Loss Challenge at the the Personalized Fitness and Health CLub and looking for more participants. Our Weight Loss Challenges are community Service and it is NON proit and cost $39 for the whole 12 week progragram. You will enjoy getting alot of great nutritional information in achieving your weight loss and improving Your Wellness! The more participants we get the bigger the pot of cash the winners (or the LOSERS) will win. Do you want it to be YOU???

Interested?
Call or email if you are interested and plan to come. It will be held every Tuesday evenings at 6PM for 12 weeks at the Personalized Fitness and Health CLub, 1587 Hyde Park Ave, yde Park, MA 02136

Sincerely,
Helene Smith
Hyde Park Weight Loss Coach and Organizer

group.name: The Attleboro Weight Loss Challenge Meetup

item.name: Hyde Park Weight Loss Challenge
